Journal Story: been preparing for another section this yearBeen day hiking each day for past 100 days …just trying to get my legs back
Did a one day hike to fill in some missing miles I had in NJ .. now done with NJ -- took advantage of 60F weather in February
Planning to continue through the last segment of NJ and up to Bear mountain NY…Try out some equipment …..preparing for 2024

Yesterday and today I did day hikes continuing to put in miles that I have not done yet. I hope to hike weekends and whenever I can for the year and would like to hike all AT sections to Massachusetts at least. Any sections I cover this year, I will skip next year when I hike my version of the through hike or as I have come to understand it to be called a LASH.Was a beautiful day for a hike rain cleared at 11 and became sunny and mid 60s.Had the scariest moment as I was coming down a small hill I heard a crash above me. I instantly put my hand over my head and dashed forward and to the right. And one foot to my left right in the middle of the trail a tree crashed down. No wind it just fell!
